main event: A stationary object was observed making a swirling motion before disappearing suddenly, with no noise heard.
interesting points: The object was observed for 4 minutes.
The object appeared to stop midair before disappearing.
The report concludes the object was likely balloons.
The report mentions a projectile and smoke plane were observed in the water.
The report was part of Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's program for investigating UFOs.
sighted object: Stationary object making a swirling motion
